original:
Hydrobiology is the scientific study of life and biological processes in aquatic environments. It is often regarded as a sub-discipline of ecology, encompassing various fields such as taxonomy, economic and industrial biology, morphology, and physiology, all of which focus on aquatic organisms.

Research in hydrobiology is predominantly associated with limnology, which examines freshwater systems. This research can be categorized into t
